channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Joann is no longer accepting store gift cards as it closes locations
item.description: Shoppers are frustrated that their gift cards can no longer be redeemed at Joann stores closing nationwide.

item.title: Judge orders 6 agencies to offer reinstatement to fired probationary employees
item.description: U.S. District Judge William Alsup extended relief to fired workers at the Departments of Veterans Affairs, Agriculture, Defense, Energy, Interior and ...

item.title: Meta stops ex-director from promoting critical memoir
item.description: Social media company wins US emergency ruling preventing ex-director from publicising her book.

item.title: Trump to invoke wartime power from 1798 for Guantanamo deportations
item.description: President Trump is planning to invoke a wartime law known as the Alien Enemies Act of 1798 as soon as Friday to authorize the summary deportation of s...

item.title: Senate Democrats eye plan to allow vote on GOP funding bill, avoid shutdown
item.description: The Senate plans to take up a House-passed bill to fund the government through September beginning on Friday, which needs the support of Democrats to ...

item.title: 'Huawei lobbyists' held in Belgium raids over EU corruption
item.description: The prosecutor's office said it raided 21 addresses in Belgium, according to local media.

item.title: Donatella steps down as Versace creative director
item.description: Versace is facing a creative shift as Prada looks to potentially buy the Italian fashion house.

item.title: Peace talks are in parallel universe, say Ukraine front-line troops
item.description: Ukrainian soldiers on the battlefield say they don't expect to see the war end any time soon.

item.title: Editor's Note: EPA says it will roll back climate rules. That could prove complicated
item.description: Announcing big changes to environmental rules doesn't undo facts on the ground overnight. Instead, EPA's announcement is the first step in what is lik...

item.title: Trump threatens a 200% tariff on European alcohol
item.description: European wines, champagne and other beverages could face heavy tariffs if Trump follows through with this threat.

item.title: Southern African forces to leave DR Congo as rebels gain ground
item.description: At least 17 soldiers from Malawi and South Africa have been killed in DR Congo.

item.title: Kuwait frees a group of jailed Americans, including contractors held on drug charges
Thousands of fired federal workers must be offered reinstatement, a judge rules

item.title: Trump campaigned as a protector of free speech. Critics say his actions as president threaten it
Jack Quaid on transforming rare condition into a superpower in "Novocaine"
item.description: Jack Quaid stars as a man who can't feel pain in "Novocaine," an action thriller hitting theaters Friday.

item.title: Trump's hiring freeze has halted local head counts and could threaten the U.S. census
